titleStmt.title: His Majesties message to both Houses of Parliament, upon his removall to the city of Yorke
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: At head of title, under the royal arms: Huntington 15 ̊Martii, 1641. [i.e. 1642].
Reproduction of original in the Societies of Antiquaries Library, London.
